diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Delirium (alcohol withdrawal delirium and multifactorial delirium)
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Acute alcohol withdrawal, provoked seizures, metabolic derangement, acute neurologic illness, intoxication
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with seizures, altered mental status, and autonomic instability following recent cessation of alcohol consumption. Considering his history of alcohol withdrawal seizures and symptoms consistent with alcohol withdrawal syndrome, along with a negative workup for other cause of seizures, the diagnosis of alcohol withdrawal delirium was established.
